pages.text: $(l)JEI bookmarks$(reset) are a powerful tool you can use as a todo list or simply to keep track of what you’re working on. By hovering over an item in JEI and pressing $(l)$(k:jei.bookmark)$(reset) you’ll add that item to your list.

$(l)Check the left side of your screen!$(reset) Your item is now pinned there and it will stay pinned until you press $(l)$(k:jei.bookmark)$(reset) on it again, to delete it from the list. Use the bookmarks to track down long recipe chains or to remind yourself what to work on next!
